Great for All Snow Sports: Bonus a carry bag for helmet, you can take it anywhere! Every winter sport lovers must have one Odoland Ski Helmet set with eye-catching goggles. It’s not only for skiing. name: Giro Aria MIPS Snow Helmet - Women's
short_description: MARKET-LEADING PROTECTION: Engineered in Giro's category-leading helmet test lab.

SPHERICAL Mips: A refinement and evolution of the Multi-Directional Impact Protection System (Mips). With this sophisticated design, two layers of EPP foam fit together like a ball-and-socket. The system helps protect from rotational energy.

INTEGRATED VIVID SHIELD - The smart and stylish shield will keep you protected from the elements without interfering with your favorite eyewear and without smudging make up. There is plush, comfortable face foam on the shield and nose bridge. VIVID Optics

VENTILATION: Thermostat Control adjustable venting allows you to custom tune airflow instantly with a simple, low profile control button on the outside of the helmet. No other system is faster or easier to adjust, and nothing is more effective at keeping you comfortable. Stack Vent in the front of the helmet which aligns with your goggles and helps to keep them clear and fog free.

FEATURES: Spherical Mips. Women's styling and details. Seamlessly integrated shield that articulates and has VIVID optics by Zeiss. Polartec Power Grid padding. Compatible with aftermarket audio systems.

name: Giro Vue MIPS Vivid Ski Helmet -Snowboard Helmet with Integrated Vivid Goggle Shield/Visor
short_description: CONSTRUCTION - Mips - Multi-Directional Impact Protection System. I.M. Construction fuses a tough polycarbonate outer shell with the helmet's impact-absorbing foam liner. The fusion process allows for better ventilation systems, making I.M. helmets lighter and cooler than traditional helmets.

FIT SYSTEM - In Form Fit System makes it easy to dial in a custom fit in seconds - even with gloves on. An ergo-friendly dial at the base of the helmet provides up to 6cm of adjustment and enhanced stability. Vertical Tuning feature accommodates different goggles and head shapes for a custom fit free of gaper gap (space between goggles and helmet).

VENTILATION - Thermostat Control adjustable venting allows you to custom tune airflow instantly with a simple, low profile control button on the outside of the helmet. No other system is faster or easier to adjust, and nothing is more effective at keeping you comfortable. Stack Vent in the front of the helmet which aligns with your goggles and helps to keep them clear and fog free.

INTEGRATED VIVID SHIELD - The convertible shield offer protection from the elements (including harmful UV light) while offering an exceptionally wide field of view and impressive optical clarity. There is plush, comfortable face foam on the shield and nose bridge.
FEATURES - Mips. Integrated Vivid Shield. XT2 anti-odor padding. Compatible with aftermarket audio systems.

name: Demon United Ski and Snowboard Visor Helmet-Snowboard Helmet with Removable Visor Goggles and Rear Dial Adjustment- Snow Sport Helmets for Men and Women
short_description: The Demon United Team Visor Snow Helmet is a top-of-the-line piece of equipment that offers protection and comfort for winter sports enthusiasts. Designed with the latest technology and materials, this helmet is engineered to meet the demands of even the most extreme winter conditions. The ear pads offer extreme cusion and venting to allow heat to escape and fresh air to enter.

Crafted with a durable outer shell, the Team Visor Snow Helmet is built to withstand impacts. The helmet also features an adjustable visor that can be easily moved up or down to suit your needs, providing optimal visibility and protection from the elements. This is perfect to wear glasses under and will keep your glasses clear of snow and ice. The Visor can also be removed if wanted. The Visor offers UV protection, Anti- Fog coated and scatch resistant and has a Smoke/Mirror finnish.

Inside the helmet, you'll find a comfortable and breathable lining that wicks away moisture and keeps you dry and warm. The helmet's ventilation system ensures that air flows freely through the helmet, preventing overheating and ensuring that you stay comfortable throughout your day on the slopes. The venting system can eaily open and close creating a custom system allowing you to receive more air flow or less to help ensure you are warm and dry.

This Demon Helmet also features a custom dial adjustment system on the back of the helmet to allow for easy adjustment for your head size. Whether you're skiing, or snowboarding, the Team Visor Snow Helmet is the perfect choice for anyone who values safety and comfort. So why wait? Invest in the best equipment for your winter adventures and enjoy the peace of mind that comes with knowing you're protected by the best.

product_description: Introducing the Advex Sport Helmet, a revolutionary snowmobile helmet that combines innovative design and advanced technology. Certified DOT and ECE, this modular helmet offers unparalleled convenience, protection, and flexibility. Key features include a 4-year limited warranty, lightweight M-FORGE Composite shell, innovative full-face access, adjustable peak, dual-lens anti-fog visor, retractable sun visor, prescription eyeglasses compatibility, adjustable humidity extractor vents, noise-reducing NCS System, optional LED utility light and VIBE Mesh communication system, neck skirt, humidity control breathguard, gloved-hand operability, multiple shell and EPS sizes for better fit, ratcheting quick-release chin strap, recyclable shell, aerodynamic shape, and DOT and ECE 2206 certification.
